ai-vv19:1.4_0: like a daughter-in-law of a wave,
ai-vv19:3.1_0: I ask you, Queen, the women of the great power,
ai-vv19:3.3_0: Whose mind is not developed like this?
ai-vv19:4.2_0: Moggallāna asked Mahā Moggallāna the Accountant
ai-vv19:4.3_0: asked a question, and he answered the questions.
ai-vv19:4.4_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv19:5.1_0: “Having gone forth from the household life,
ai-vv19:6.1_0: as well as misserable when swept out.
ai-vv19:6.3_0: When you’ve left the straight ground,
ai-vv19:7.1_0: I rejoice in the four quarters.
ai-vv19:7.4_0: on the fourteenth and the fifteenth days,
ai-vv19:8.1_0: and the eighth day of the fortnight,
ai-vv19:9.1_0: He refrains from killing living creatures,
ai-vv19:9.4_0: avoid a care of the rod,
ai-vv19:10.1_0: Pañcasikha had developed the five wives.
ai-vv19:11.3_0: and so very beautiful, he looks down on all sides.
ai-vv19:12.1_0: Moreover, sir, you should bow down in my name and say:
ai-vv19:12.2_0: ‘Sir, the laywomen named Padumavatī bows with his head to your feet.’
ai-vv19:12.3_0: But it’s not incredible, sir, that the Buddha might declare me
